text:
@WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence ppl r losing their livelihood, minds, n more. we should open america safely. we dont want to tank the economy n destroy america. we must have the right balance: save lives n protect  america for our future, our kids, n grandkids. 
https://t.co/nRfCnx8q2a
